ubuntustudio-look contains all of the thematic content for Ubuntu Studio

=== Binary Packages ===

* <nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=ubuntustudio-look|ubuntustudio-look]]</nowiki> - Meta package that depends on Ubuntu Studio thematic packages.
* <nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=plymouth-theme-ubuntustudio|plymouth-theme-ubuntustudio]]</nowiki> - The plymouth theme shown during boot.
* <nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=ubuntustudio-wallpapers|ubuntustudio-wallpapers]]</nowiki> - collection of Ubuntu Studio wallpapers
